subject: Order #SSN3022
description_text:
Hello, good evening, after updating my Simsonn Plus X Pedals, the
accelerator and clutch, even when pressed to the maximum,just goes to 39%,
does not go to 100% anymore.

Can you help me please? Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Sneky,    After replacing the hardware, you must recalibrate. You can click here and then press the pedal to recalibrate.

Hello,

I didn't replace my hardware, it was the firmware update on the app.
recalibrating isn't working to fix.


support@simsonn.com

Hi Sneky,     You can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to enter the firmware update process:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX controller box, then reconnect the USB. The software will enter SIMSONN Flasher Mode;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.         https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

I redid the calibration after restarting the PC and now it's working.

Thank you.
